titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States granting Congress the authority to enact laws limiting the number of terms that Representatives and Senators may serve.
Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States granting Congress the authority to enact laws limiting the number of terms that Representatives and Senators may serve.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution and Civil Justice.

bill.summary:
Constitutional Amendment
This joint resolution proposes a constitutional amendment authorizing Congress, by law, to limit the number of terms that Representatives and Senators may serve.
